text: Abemeramana ntibakagire abahakanyi inshuti ngo babarutishe abemera. Uzakora ibyo azaba yitandukanyije na Allah, keretse hari inabi mutinya ko yabaturukaho (icyo gihe ntimuzabereke urwango. Nimunavuga urukundo bizabe ari ku munwa bitari ku mutima). Allah arababurira kumutinya, kandi kwa Allah ni ho (byose) bizasubira
